Reference

All functions

comp_boot_res()

A wrapper for the residual bootstrap of a fitted OLS regression model

comp_bootstrap_summary()

Create an empirical or multiplier bootstrap summary table

comp_coef_rwgt()

Obtain estimates of GLM or OLS under reweighting of one or multiple regressors

comp_coef_rwgt_single()

Obtain estimates for GLM of OLS under reweighting of one regressor

comp_cond_model()

Fit OLS or GLM on the data

comp_conf_int_bootstrap()

Confidence intervals for on bootstrapped datasets via percentile bootstrap

comp_empirical_bootstrap()

A wrapper for the empirical bootstrap of a fitted OLS or GLM regression model

comp_empirical_bootstrap_samples()

Draw bootstrap samples from the data

comp_grid_centers()

Create grid of centers for the reweighting of the regressor's distribution

comp_multiplier_bootstrap_var()

A wrapper to replicate the multiplier bootstrap calculation for an OLS fitted dataset

comp_multiplier_single_bootstrap_var()

Calculate a single replication of the multiplier bootstrap for an OLS fitted dataset

comp_sandwich_qr_var()

Compute the sandwich estimator of standard errors for OLS

focal_rwgt_var()

Obtain the "focal reweighting variable" model diagnostic.

focal_slope()

Obtain the "focal slope" model diagnostic

gen_multiplier_bootstrap_weights()

Generate Different Types of multiplier bootstrap weights

nonlinearity_detection()

Obtain the "nonlinearity detection" model diagnostic

qqnorm_bootstrap()

Normal QQ plot of the terms in an output of the bootstrap function

set_ggplot2_theme()

Set the custom theme for our plots
